description: This table contains HB Guarantor Payment Score history items.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCORE_DATE
columns.description: This item will store the date of the score.

columns.name: SCORE
columns.description: This history item will store the self-pay score.

columns.name: AVG_SP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This history item will store the average self-pay level for the score.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Level 1


Level 2


Level 3


Level 4


Level 5


Level 6


Level 7


Level 8


Level 9


Level 10

columns.name: UNCOLL_BALANCE_YN
columns.description:
This history item will store if there has been any uncollectable balance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ONLINE_PMT_YN
columns.description:
This history item will store if a payment through MyChart or another electronic portal was used for scoring.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNCOLL_BALANCE_YN
